info.name: Blue and Black Messenger
info.description:
A unique messenger theme. Includes a nice organized UI theme, some pretty good animation. This theme might just be better than the original or any other theme you used.

Website: http://www.game-adventure.weebly.com
info.additionalInfo:
This theme is mainly towards space and sci-fi, it does look pretty cool. This does use some external sources because of how long the code was with base64. It still works though as tested, if it doesn't work, than check to see if you have imgur blocked by an extension.

Update notes (3.1.2):
1.) Added some small details.

CPU Usage Warning:
I have tested performance to see how it affects it, it doesn't affect memory in any way, I don't think but does affect CPU drastically, but if you are just using messenger and stuff, shouldn't affect anything, it doesn't affect me any so it is all good.

How to fix: To fix any cpu issues, go and edit it and remove all styles that has @keyframes name {}, the name is a variable, meaning it can be anything, the the brackets holds the codes of the animation.

The screenshot displayed is way out of date, the newer one was too large to upload by about 100kbs.
